Angder.name: Angder
description: Angder is chaotic, violent, and has a love of combat. He often goes <c=boldPink>missing</c> for extended periods in order to steal from and damage the enemy ship.

Butler.name: D26 Droid
description: D26 Service Droid. A model of service droid built to do factory work, or to clean. They clean by <c=boldPink>Exhausting cards.</c>

SalvageArm.name: CLAW
SalvageArm.description: Every third turn after the start of combat, Move a card of your choice from your exhaust pile, to your hand.

VacuumCleaner.name: VACUUM
VacuumCleaner.description: Everytime you create or are given a card in combat, it goes straight into your echaust pile.

LeakyPipe.name: LEAKING PIPE
LeakyPipe.description: Adds a <c=card>FUME</c> card to your hand every other turn.

FreeWill.name: FREE WILL
FreeWill.description: When your hull is damaged, increases <c=status>THE OLD CODE</c> by 1.

Accellerant.name: SMOOTH COGS
Accellerant.description: Draw an extra card each turn. <c=downside>Shuffling your deck disables this artifact for the rest of the combat.</c>

PersonalJetpack.name: PERSONAL JETPACK
PersonalJetpack.description: Gain 1 extra <c=energy>ENERGY</c> every turn. <c=downside>Angder Goes missing at the start of every turn, if he isn't missing already.</c>

EnergySiphon.name: ENERGY SIPHON
EnergySiphon.description: The first two times each turn you gain <c=status>Angder goes missing</c>, gain 1 <c=energy>ENERGY</c>.

AggressiveSiphon.name: SHIELD DIVERTER
AggressiveSiphon.description: Gives you 2 <c=status>POWER SIPHON</c> at the start of each combat, every time <c=status>POWER SIPHON</c> triggers, reduce enemy shields by 2.

ChainAxe.name: CHAINSAW AXE
ChainAxe.description: For every 3 cards played in one turn that are not from Angder or his lootstash, gain 1 rampage. <c=downside>Capped at three activations per turn.</c>

Biggerbullets.name: BIGGER SHELLS
Biggerbullets.description: Destroying Midrow objects deals 2 damage to the enemy ship. UNUSED

HairTrigger.name: HAIRTRIGGER
HairTrigger.description: At the start of each combat, At the start of combat, add a <c=card>Slight Nudge</c> to your discard pile. Add 1 more for every 5 cards in your deck past 10.

ShipsManifest.name: SHIPS MANIFEST
ShipsManifest.description: At the start of combat, gain 3 <c=status>PLANNED HEIST</c>. <c=status>PLANNED HEIST</c> grants an extra card.

description.None: Gain 4 <c=status>shield</c>, add 2 <c=card>Comm Jam</c> cards to your discard pile.
description.A: Gain 4 <c=status>shield</c>, add 2 <c=card>Comm Jam</c> cards to your discard pile.
description.B: Gain 6 <c=status>shield</c>, add 3 <c=card>Comm Jam</c> cards to your discard pile.

description.None: Add 1 <c=card>Trash</c> directly to your <c=cardtrait>Exhaust</c> pile. Gain 1 <c=status>shield</c>.
description.A: Add 2 <c=card>Trash</c> directly to your <c=cardtrait>Exhaust</c> pile. Gain 1 <c=status>shield</c>.
description.B: Add 3 <c=card>Fumes</c> to your draw pile. Gain 2 <c=status>shield</c>.

description.None: Pick a card from your Exhaust pile and play it for free.
description.A: Pick a card from your Exhaust pile and play it for free.
description.B: Pick a card from your Exhaust pile and play it for free.

description.None: Add 2 <c=cardtrait>Single use</c>, <c=card>Debris</c> cards to Exhaust. Attack for <c=boldPink>{{damage1}}</c>.
description.A: Add 2 <c=cardtrait>Single use</c>, <c=card>Debris</c> cards to Exhaust. Attack for <c=boldPink>{{damage2}}</c>.
description.B: Add 1 <c=cardtrait>Single use</c>, <c=card>Garbage</c> card to Exhaust. Attack for <c=boldPink>{{damage3}}</c>.

description.None: On draw, attack <c=boldPink>{{damage}}</c> then draw a card. Exhaust.
description.A: On draw, attack <c=boldPink>{{damage2}}</c> then draw a card. Exhaust.
description.B: On draw, attack <c=boldPink>{{damage3}}</c> then draw 2 cards. Exhaust.

description.None: Add 2 <c=card>Diagnostic Complete</c> cards to your draw pile.
description.A: Add 3 <c=card>Diagnostic Complete</c> cards to your draw pile.
description.B: Add 2 <c=card>Diagnostic Complete B</c> cards to your draw pile.

description.None: Select a card in hand, it gains Remote control.
description.A: Select two cards in hand, they gain Remote control.
description.B: Every card in your hand gains Remote control.

description.None: Add 2 <c=card>Accidental Overload</c> cards to your draw pile.
description.A: Add 3 <c=card>Accidental Overload</c> cards to your draw pile.
description.B: Add 2 <c=card>Accidental Overload B</c> cards to your draw pile.

description.None: Deal damage = to hull. Then take enemy hull as damage.
description.A: Deal piercing damage = to hull. Then take enemy hull as pierce damage.
description.B: Deal damage = to hull. Then take enemy hull as damage.

description.None: Add 1 of 2 <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=3A4999>Angder</c> cards and an <c=card>AngderBot</c> to hand.
description.A: Add 1 of 2 <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=3A4999>Angder</c> cards and an <c=card>AngderBot</c> to hand.
description.B: Add 1 of 3 <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=3A4999>Angder</c> cards and an <c=card>AngderBot</c> to hand.

Remotecontrol.name: Remote Control
Remotecontrol.description: This card can be used while its owner is missing.

Rampage.name: RAMPAGE
Rampage.description: If <c=3A4999>Angder</c> is missing at start of your turn: Deals <c=boldPink>{0}</c> hull damage to the enemy, <c=downside>and then loses half it's stacks</c>

Theft.name: PLANNED HEIST
Theft.description: If <c=3A4999>Angder</c> is missing at start of your turn: add a 0 cost card into your hand from Angder's haul, <c=downside>then decreases by 1.</c>

DisposalProcess.name: Disposal Process
DisposalProcess.description: Every time you play a card from the trash deck, draw {0}.

FuelSiphon.name: FUEL SIPHON
FuelSiphon.description: If <c=3A4999>Angder</c> is missing at start of your turn: Gain 1 <c=status>EVADE</c>, <c=downside>then decreases by 1.</c>

FuelDump.name: FUEL DUMP
FuelDump.description: If <c=3A4999>Angder</c> is missing at end of your turn: Applies <c=status>ENGINE LOCK</c> to the enemy ship, <c=downside>then decreases by 1.</c>

Disrupt.name: POWER SIPHON
Disrupt.description: If <c=3A4999>Angder</c> is missing at end of your turn: gain <c=boldPink>{0}</c> <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c>, <c=downside>then decreases by 1. If it's over 5, it decreases down to 5.</c>

Exhaustover3.name: Exhausted cards, divided by 3.
Exhaustover3.description: Always rounded down. Could alternatively be written as one for every 3 exhausted cards.

Exhaustover6.name: Exhausted cards, divided by 6.
Exhaustover6.description: Always rounded down. Could alternatively be written as one for every 6 exhausted cards.

Exhaustover5.name: Exhausted cards, divided by 5.
Exhaustover5.description: Always rounded down. Could alternatively be written as one for every 5 exhausted cards.

Exhaustover10.name: Exhausted cards, divided by 10.
Exhaustover10.description: Always rounded down. Could alternatively be written as one for every 10 exhausted cards.

Warmode.name: The Old code.
Warmode.description: Every time you play a card from the trash deck, attack for {0}.

description.Positive: Instantly move the enemy {{number}} to the right.
description.Negative: Instantly move the enemy {{number}} to the left.

description.Right: Fire <c=boldPink>{{Long}}</c> shots, dealing <c=boldPink>{{truedamage}}</c> damage each. Each shot drifts further to the Right
description.Left: Fire <c=boldPink>{{Long}}</c> shots, dealing <c=boldPink>{{truedamage}}</c> damage each. Each shot drifts further to the Left
description.Unknown: Fire <c=boldPink>{{Long}}</c> shots, dealing <c=boldPink>{{truedamage}}</c> damage each. Each shot drifts further in a random, but consistant, direction.

description.Hand: Pick a card in your hand, <c=downside>Exhaust it.</c>
description.Deck: Pick a card in your Deck, <c=downside>Exhaust it.</c>
description.Discard: Pick a card in your discard pile, <c=downside>Exhaust it.</c>
description.Draw: Pick a card in your draw pile, <c=downside>Exhaust it.</c>

description.Damage: Deal damage equal to your current hull. <c=downside>You then take damage equal to their remaining Hull value.</c> this attack does not require you to be facing the enemy, and cannot be dodged.
description.Piercing: Deal damage equal to your current hull, bypassing their shields. <c=downside>You then take piercing damage equal to their remaining Hull value.</c> this attack does not require you to be facing the enemy, and cannot be dodged.

description.Damage: This action deals a set amount of damage per shot, it cannot be modified by status effects or artifacts.

Trashbag.name: Trashbag
Trashbag.description: Will block one attack. When destroyed, puts a <c=card>TRASH</c> into your hand.
